title: Highlight Hover Line
content: Set the highlight-hover-row attribute to control whether to enable the highlight function when the cursor is moved to the current line. The default value is true. If you do not need to hover and highlight, set highlight-hover-row to false.

title: Highlight a specified line
content:
The

title: Enable the selected row to be highlighted
content:
Set the highlight-current-row attribute to control whether to highlight selected lines.

The lines with zebra crossings are not highlighted.

title: Whether to highlight the column header
content: Set the highlight-hover-column attribute to control whether to enable the highlight function when the cursor is moved to the column header of the current column.

title: Specifies whether to highlight the selected column.
content: Set the highlight-current-column attribute to determine whether to highlight the current column.
